channel.title: Mopar should add a word filter for just 1 day
channel.description:
Mopar should add a word filter for just 1 day for a practical joke.
This is what it would be:
Moparscaper = Shoobie
Fail = Beef
Moparisthebest.com = Secret surfing spot
Noob = Squid
Java = Ancient Hawaiian secrets
Moparisthebest = Raymundo
drunkenoldma = Tito

item.title: Mopar should add a word filter for just 1 day
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:27, topic:201888”][quote author=cooper link=topic=266540.msg2204674#msg2204674 date=1209112117]

Uggggh you people are such squids. Why are you on the secret surfing spot? Especially you Thabest, you beef so badly, you should learn the ancient hawaiian secrets, and learn not to be a shoobie. I hope Raymundo will ban you for bringing Tito up in the topic.

Amirite?

Your first non spam post. Rep +

I didn’t know you can rep people with 12 rep.

I’m pretty sure you can’t.
[/quote]

It was sarcasm…[/quote]
I know.

Read full topic
item.source: Mopar should add a word filter for just 1 day

item.title: Mopar should add a word filter for just 1 day
